meanings.definition: The state or quality of being cushy.
meanings.sent1: The cushinesses of the sofa made it perfect for lounging.
meanings.sent2: I love the cushinesses of my bed after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the cushinesses of the blanket irresistible for a nap.
meanings.sent4: The cushinesses of the cloud-like pillow embraced her tired head.
meanings.sent5: The cushinesses of the marshmallow reminded her of soft clouds.

meanings.definition: The comfortable or luxurious quality of something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the cushinesses of the first-class seat on the plane.
meanings.sent2: The hotel's cushinesses made it a popular choice for travelers.
meanings.sent3: The cushinesses of the spa robe made her feel like royalty.
meanings.sent4: The cushinesses of the velvet couch added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The cushinesses of the cashmere sweater kept her warm in style.

meanings.definition: The ease or comfort provided by a cushy situation.
meanings.sent1: He basked in the cushinesses of his stress-free vacation.
meanings.sent2: The cushinesses of working from home include wearing pajamas all day.
meanings.sent3: The cushinesses of having a personal chef meant never cooking again.
meanings.sent4: The cushinesses of the hammock lulled him into a peaceful nap.
meanings.sent5: The cushinesses of the job perks made the employees happy.
